steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We hop on a call. You tell me what you're trying to accomplish. I tell you honestly if I can help. No pitch, no pressure.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: We figure out exactly what we need to capture, when, and where. You'll know the plan before we show up with cameras.

steps.title: Production
steps.description: We show up, we shoot, we stay out of your way as much as possible. Your team keeps working. We get what we need.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: You get polished files your marketing person can actually use. Sized right, formatted right, ready to post or send to print.
